attributes.action: Scrap the 2012 London Olympics brand logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The London 2012 Olympics committee has unveiled the branding of the 2012 London Olympics to worldwide public derision.They refuse to change the logo in spite of public protest and other internet petitions passing the 50000 signature mark. As a large part of the London Olympics will be funded by the public, through the government and the UK lottery, we petition the Prime Minster to urge the London Olympics Committee to scrap the current brand and open it up to a public competition.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/2012-Emblem/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
